meanings.definition: The quality or state of being undeniable.
meanings.sent1: Her undeniablenesses in the debate left everyone convinced of her argument.
meanings.sent2: The undeniablenesses of the evidence made it impossible to ignore the truth.
meanings.sent3: His undeniablenesses about always being right sometimes made his friends laugh.
meanings.sent4: The undeniablenesses of nature's beauty were like a painting come to life.
meanings.sent5: The undeniablenesses of his loyalty shone through in every action he took.

meanings.definition: The fact of being impossible to deny or dispute.
meanings.sent1: The undeniablenesses of the situation were clear to everyone involved.
meanings.sent2: There was no escaping the undeniablenesses of the truth that was revealed.
meanings.sent3: The undeniablenesses of his love for ice cream were evident in his daily trips to the shop.
meanings.sent4: The undeniablenesses of time passing quickly became more apparent as she grew older.
meanings.sent5: The undeniablenesses of the storm's power were felt by all who witnessed its fury.
